participant_1.background:
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

participant_2.background:
I like to do spontaneous things on the weekend, like go for walks in the woods at midnight.
i like to drink at bars with friends.
I enjoy a cheeseburger once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i am fluent in spanish.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
Doing great, thanks for asking! What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I enjoy writing my own songs and reading a lot. I also love going for walks in the woods. What about you?
I like to go for walks in the woods too! I also like to go to bars with friends and drink beer.
Oh, I love beer! Do you have a favorite beer?
I really like IPAs, especially the ones from Sierra Nevada.
I've never had a Sierra Nevada IPA, but I'll have to try one! What do you like to do for exercise?
I like to go running and play basketball. I also used to have a motorcycle, but I had to sell it to pay for my car.
Oh, that's too bad! I've never been on a motorcycle, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
